name: A Mini Falafel Adventure
description:
A Mini Falafel Adventure is a 4-colour, concentrated, action-oriented "Metroidvania" adventure game with an emphasis on memorable boss fights, quirky characters and gameplay-twisting new abilities. This was developed over 3 years and is the game I always wanted to make. It features a chiptune & funk/disco soundtrack by Reed Richards. 

Run and jump until you get to the end of the game!
